text: Christian Sorto (born January 19, 2000) is an American soccer player who plays as a forward for Loudoun United in the USL Championship. ==Career== On June 26, 2019, Sorto joined D.C. United's USL Championship side Loudoun United. ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:Association football forwards Category:Loudoun United FC players Category:Soccer players from Maryland Category:USL Championship players Category:American people of Salvadoran descent
title: Christian Sorto
